name: Lucario Vs The World 2
description:
Things have been different since we talked. Ever since I met her.

nickkennedy presents...
Lucario Vs The World 2.
----------------------------------------
Hey everyone! I wanna start off by thanking all of you for the continued support. I couldn't be happier to be making these games for you, and even with their flaws, I think they're something we can all enjoy.

This began as a simple level editor for one of my older games, Lucario Vs the World, but then I completely lost it and went all out with this passion project.
I think, In my life at least, I never really get to where I intended with my art. But, this time, I'm not so sure. Before I get too pretentious and completely lose my mind, I'll get into the actual description.
-----------------------
Controls
Help Lucario save his friend in a trippy aritstic platformer!
Platforming Levels are controlled with the arrow keys.
Space Shooting Levels are controlled with the arrow keys and z. You move forward automatically. Shoot the baddies before they get you!
3D Maze Levels- Move with the mouse. Find the door and click it!
The Level Editor is very basic, but if you have any ideas I'll add it to an update and credit you! I also take music and graphics.
